column4: just bought an alienware m11x with nvidia 540m graphics installed ubuntu 10.04 download nvidia driver binary but won't let you run the binery in X how do get to text only mode??
ctrl + Alt + F1 is not working for some strange reason
manually installing nvidia.com's driver is a bad idea (but "might" be required) - ctrl+alt+f1 then "sudo service gdm stop"
is there any other way than Ctrl +alt +f1 ?
if you just ran "sudo service gdm stop" from the gui it will stop and spit you out at a VT (ctrl+alt+f1) - but if that doesn't work, you've got a problem
did you install using a mini cd or something?  "sudo service gdm stop" is what you are running?
standard dvd what could be the problem?
sorry i don't know what your issue (with *DM is).  Guess i can't help, Good luck.
how do you fill a flash drive full off random data ??
that's just a guess remember, and be careful to get the device correct
